definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

pinyin: sheng1 wu4 kong3 bu4 zhu3 yi4

sentences.english: But the mystique that surrounded the terrorist chieftain in life is persisting in death.
sentences.chinese: 但是圍繞這位恐怖主義首領一生的謎團卻並未解開。

sentences.english: In his latest article he lashed into those terrorists.
sentences.chinese: 他在最近一篇文章中嚴厲抨擊了那些恐怖主義分子。

sentences.english: Their veto was tantamount to terrorism.
sentences.chinese: 他說這五個國家手中的否決權就等同於恐怖主義。

sentences.english: All the countries have no choice but to unite a gainst terrorism.
sentences.chinese: 所有國家沒有別的選擇，只有聯合起來對抗恐怖主義。

sentences.english: The policy emphasizes the prevention of nuclear proliferation and nuclear terrorism.
sentences.chinese: 該政策強調防止核擴散及防範核恐怖主義。

sentences.english: The chart below tracks the number of terrorist-related fatalities worldwide.
sentences.chinese: 下表追蹤了世界範圍內與恐怖主義相關的死亡人數。

sentences.english: She’ll be tried in the United States on terrorism charges.
sentences.chinese: 她將在美國以恐怖主義罪名接受審判。

sentences.english: The US military often uses the tactic of gunboat diplomacy to squelch acts of terrorism.
sentences.chinese: 美國軍方常使用炮艇外交的戰術來粉碎恐怖主義行動。

sentences.english: It engages in espionage and terrorism with Isreal.
sentences.chinese: 它從事對以色列的間諜活動和恐怖主義。

sentences.english: Terrorism has become a common evil of the world and a common enemy of the entire humanity.
sentences.chinese: 恐怖主義已成爲國際公害，是全人類的共同敵人。

sentences.english: His drive, charisma, and raw nerve have made him a very dangerous man.
sentences.chinese: 他的動力，領袖魅力和恐怖主義使得他非常危險。

sentences.english: Furthermore, possessors are the preferred targets for terrorism and theft.
sentences.chinese: 而且，有核國家是恐怖主義分子和盜竊者偏愛的目標。

sentences.english: Malaysian anti-terrorism situation is gloomy and doomy and anti-terrorism is an arduous task.
sentences.chinese: 馬來西亞的恐怖主義形勢不容樂觀，反恐任務艱鉅。

sentences.english: Under the pretext of opposition to the US-British occupation of the terrorists, depending on human life such as ants.
sentences.chinese: 藉口反對美英佔領的恐怖主義者，視人命如螻蟻。

sentences.english: There was a growing tendency of terrorism in this terrirory.
sentences.chinese: 這塊地域上恐怖主義有增長的趨勢。

sentences.english: Putin also made clear Russia's stance and views on issues like anti-terrorism.
sentences.chinese: 普京還介紹了俄對反對恐怖主義等問題的立場和看法。

definition: terrorist attack (abbr. for 恐怖襲擊|恐怖袭击[kong3 bu4 xi2 ji1])
Muslim countries/caliphate/Islamic State group (aka IS or ISIL or ISIS)
could happen at any moment/on the verge
